requests.name: The basketball leagues endpoint serves as a decode...
requests.description: The basketball leagues endpoint serves as a decode for the available leagues names, abbreviations, and URI paths.

queryParams.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json
Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint
A teamId returns information for that team only.  If entered, then the conferenceId is ignored.

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
requests.description:
Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores and box scores when applicable.  The 'eventId' and 'box' parameters below are only applicable for a specific game.
 Events will also provide you with schedule data.

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint

Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box request.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

Enter a week number in conjunction with a season to return events for the specified week. 
 Default - If not used, week will be ignored.

Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

Will return all games from a specific date.

Enter a week number in conjunction with a season to return events for the specified week. 
 Default - If not used, week will be ignored.

Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.

Preferred response type.

requests.name: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and bo...
requests.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for NBA events.  (Play-by-play & Shot Charts are not available in the box endpoint.)

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint

Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box request.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

Enter a week number in conjunction with a season to return events for the specified week. 
 Default - If not used, week will be ignored.

Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and bo...
requests.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for NBA events. However, box scores are available for a single game only, and so cannot be accessed here when all events for a single team are returned. This endpoint should be used for team schedules & scores only.

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint

  Default - the current season

Enter a week number in conjunction with a season to return events for the specified week. 
 Default - If not used, week will be ignored.

Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: The participants endpoint provides biographical in...
requests.description: The participants endpoint provides biographical information for players and can be used to return information on a single player, a single teams roster, or all teams rosters within the league.

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint

Anyone who last played since the requested year.  Enter year as YYYY.
  Default - current rosters

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

requests.name: Basketball - Career stats for a single player

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint
To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

The encyclopedia returns full career and season-by-season totals.
  The encyclopedia is valid for a single player only.  If playerId is omitted, 'enc=true' will be ignored.
For a single player's career stats, only to be used in conjunction with 'enc=true'

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint
To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.

requests.name: Basketball - Player splits (breakdowns).

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint
To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

Enter the stat split to be returned. (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  1. If omitted, only official total stats (splitId = -1) will be returned.
  2. If 'all', all the splits are returned.
  3. Otherwise, the entered split is returned.

Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: Basketball - Team splits (breakdowns).

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint
A teamId returns information for that team only.  If entered, then the conferenceId is ignored.

Enter the stat split to be returned. (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  1. If omitted, only official total stats (splitId = -1) will be returned.
  2. If 'all', all the splits are returned.
  3. Otherwise, the entered split is returned.

Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: Basketball - Leaders

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint

Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Minutes).

This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

Should non-qualifiers be returned?
  Default - false

To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Trailers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: Basketball - Team Leaders

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint

Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Minutes).

This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Trailers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: Basketball - Daily Leaders

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint

Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Minutes).

Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

Leaders among specified conference only. See conferences decode endpoint for full list.
  Default - all conferences

Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

Leaders among games in the specified eventRound only. See eventRounds decode endpoint for full list.
  Default - all rounds

To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: Basketball - Decodes

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the basketball/leagues endpoint
The data type to be decoded.

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

For seasonStructure only. To get complete history of league, select allSeasons=TRUE. Only those permissioned for all historic data will be able to utilize the 'allSeasons' option.
  Default - false

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json
